ristirastinolla.logic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • ristirastinolla.logic.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    This is the game's engine which takes care all of the important functions of the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(int x, int y, Board board)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean boardIsFull()
      This method does the check for the game if the whole board is full, because we have to know it in the situation when the board is full and it's draw.
      void changeGameOverFalse()
      When one round is over and it is time to start a new round this method will change the game playable again.
      boolean getGameStatus()
      This method retruns if the game has been on or not.
      boolean hasWon(char player)
      Checks if either one of the players has won.
      void makeBoardEmpty()
      This method will clear the board for the next round.
      void nextTurn()
      This method will control turns during the game.
      void playerSelectMoves(char player, int x, int y)
      This metods does the actual move for the player and also checks if either one of the player has won or if the board is full.
      char returnPlayer()
      This method only returns the player whose turn it is at the moment.
      boolean valid(int x, int y)
      Checks if the given position is valid.

    • Method Detail

      • playerSelectMoves

        public void playerSelectMoves(char player,
                              int x,
                              int y)
        This metods does the actual move for the player and also checks if either one of the player has won or if the board is full.
        Parameters:
        player - tell's which players turn,
        x - tell's the selected x-position
        y - tell's the selected y-position

      • valid

        public boolean valid(int x,
                     int y)
        Checks if the given position is valid.
        Parameters:
        x - checks if the given row-value is correct on the gametable
        y - checks if the given co-value is correct on the gametable
        Returns:
        true if selected positions are unvalid, false if selected positions are valid

      • hasWon

        public boolean hasWon(char player)
        Checks if either one of the players has won.
        Parameters:
        player - checks if either one of the players has won the game by calling certain other methods
        Returns:
        true if the given param player has won, in any other cases it will return false

      • getGameStatus

        public boolean getGameStatus()
        This method retruns if the game has been on or not.
        Returns:
        true if either of player has won and false if not

      • returnPlayer

        public char returnPlayer()
        This method only returns the player whose turn it is at the moment.
        Returns:
        return either X or O

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
        This method will control turns during the game.

      • makeBoardEmpty

        public void makeBoardEmpty()
        This method will clear the board for the next round.

      • boardIsFull

        public boolean boardIsFull()
        This method does the check for the game if the whole board is full, because we have to know it in the situation when the board is full and it's draw.
        Returns:
        true if the board is full and false if there is still free spots.

      • changeGameOverFalse

        public void changeGameOverFalse()
        When one round is over and it is time to start a new round this method will change the game playable again.
